Requirement: "the server should not maintain any records that could associate the consumer with the entities that were queried"
"A conformant Plan-Net service **SHALL NOT** require a directory mobile application to send consumer identifying information in order to query content."
"A directory mobile application **SHALL NOT** send consumer identifiable information when querying a Plan-Net service."
"Health Plan API actors **SHALL** be capable of populating all Must Support data elements as part of the query results."
URL: Must Support section, Health Plan API Requirements bullet 1

Requirement: "In situations where information on a particular Must Support data element is not present and the minimum cardinality is 0 , the Health Plan API actors **SHALL NOT** include the data elements in the resource instance returned as part of the query results."
URL: Must Support section, Health Plan API Requirements bullet 2

Requirement: "In situations where information on a particular data element is not present and the minimum cardinality is >0 **SHALL** send the reason for the missing information using values (such as nullFlavors) from the value set where they exist or use the dataAbsentReason extension."
URL: Must Support section, Health Plan API Requirements bullet 3

Requirement: "Application actors **SHALL** be capable of processing resource instances containing the Must Support data elements without generating an error or causing the application to fail."
URL: Must Support section, Application Requirements bullet 1

Requirement: "Application actors **SHOULD** be capable of displaying the data elements for human use or storing the information for other purposes."
URL: Must Support section, Application Requirements bullet 2

Requirement: "When querying Health Plan API actors, Application actors **SHALL** interpret missing Must Support data elements within resource instances as data not present in the Health Plan API actors system."
URL: Must Support section, Application Requirements bullet 3

Requirement: "Consumer App actors **SHALL** be able to process resource instances containing Must Support data elements asserting missing information."
URL: Must Support section, Application Requirements bullet 4

Requirement: "Clients that cache query results can track additions or modifications to directory content through queries that filter content using the _lastUpdated search parameter."
URL: Section "Client Detection of Updates Directory Content"

Requirement: "Clients should periodically check that data cached from past queries has not been deleted by querying for the same elements by _id."
URL: Section "Client Detection of Updates Directory Content"

Requirement: "It is important for payers to use the Plan-Net profiles consistently in order to achieve true interoperability of directory information among payers."
URL: Section "Representing and Searching Provider Directory Data"

Requirement: "The Plan-Net design is based around the following types of searches. [General Search, Provider by Name, Organization by Name, Provider by Specialty, Organization by Specialty]"
URL: Section "Representing and Searching Provider Directory Data", Table in content

Requirement: "HealthcareServices are typically provided by an organization, except in the case of a Practitioner that is not associated with an organization (see the solo practitioner example)"
"HealthcareServices ... can be linked to a set of locations where service is provided, or identified as virtual services through an indicated set of virtual modalities."
"All organizations that provide service should define an appropriate set. of HealthcareServices to facilitate search."
"The HealthcareService category, specialty and type fields are the highest level of organization of the services provided by the provider's network."
"Practitioners and Organizations indicate participation in a Network with a link to the Network using a PractitionerRole or OrganizationAffiliation instance, respectively."
"PractitionerRole and OrganizationAffiliation instances are what tie Practitioners and Organizations to HealthcareServices, Organizations, Networks and Locations."
"The examples demonstrate the use of the InsurancePlan profile to represent two distinct Qualified Health Plan products covering the state of Connecticut, using a pair of Networks."
"The practitioners and organizations in the examples participate in one or both of these networks."

"Organization Affiliation instances describe a role, and link a participating organization that provides or performs the role, with an organization where that role is available, and also links the participating organization to a HealthcareServices and networks."
"OrganizationalAffiliation can also be used to associate a HealthcareService provided by an organization with networks."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have a category."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have a type."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have a name."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have an active status (active element)."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have a telecom."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have a location."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have an endpoint."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have a meta.profile of 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/plannet-HealthcareService'."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have a category coding with system 'http://hl7.org/fhir/service-category' and code 'cancer'."
"The HealthcareService resource SHALL have a type coding with system 'http://hl7.org/fhir/service-type' and code '394593009'."

"The [HealthCareService] resource may be used to encompass a variety of services covering the entire healthcare spectrum, including promotion, prevention, diagnostics, pharmacy, hospital and ambulatory care, home care, long-term care, and other health-related and community services."
"An InsurancePlan is a discrete package of health insurance coverage benefits that are offered under a particular network type."
"A given payer's products typically differ by network type and/or covered benefits."
"A plan pairs a product's covered benefits with the particular cost sharing structure offered to a consumer."
"A given product may comprise multiple plans (i.e. each plan offers different cost sharing requirements for the same set of covered benefits)."

"InsurancePlan describes a health insurance offering comprised of a list of covered benefits (i.e. the product), costs associated with those benefits (i.e. the plan), and additional information about the offering, such as who it is owned and administered by, a coverage area, contact information, etc."
"A Location is the physical place where healthcare services are provided, practitioners are employed, organizations are based, etc."
"Locations can range in scope from a room in a building to a geographic region/area."
"A network is typically owned by a payer."
"In the PlanNet IG, individuals and organizations are represented as participants in a PLan-Net Network through the practitionerRole and Plan-Net-organizationAffiliation resources, respectively."
"An organization is a formal or informal grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose, such as a company, institution, corporation, community group, or healthcare practice."
"When the contact is a department name, rather than a human (e.g., patient help line), include a blank family and given name, and provide the department name in contact.name.text"
"The OrganizationAffiliation resource describes relationships between two or more organizations"
"The OrganizationAffiliation resource describes ... the services one organization provides another"
"The OrganizationAffiliation resource describes ... the location(s) where they provide services"
"The OrganizationAffiliation resource describes ... the availability of those services"
"The OrganizationAffiliation resource describes ... electronic endpoints"
"Practitioner is a person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare."
"When the provider is a practitioner, there may be a relationship to an organization."
"A provider renders services to patients at a location."
"Practitioner participation in healthcare provider insurance networks may be direct or through their role at an organization."
"An extension to describe accessibility options offered by a practitioner or at a location."
URL: Structures: Extension Definitions section, Accessibility extension description

Requirement: "An extension to express a practitioner's spoken proficiency with the language indicated in practitioner.communication."
URL: Structures: Extension Definitions section, Communication Proficiency extension description

Requirement: "An extension representing the days and times a contact point is available"
URL: Structures: Extension Definitions section, Contactpoint Availabletime extension description

Requirement: "An extension describing the service delivery method. If service delivery is virtual, one or more delivery modalities should be specified."
URL: Structures: Extension Definitions section, Delivery Method extension description

Requirement: "If service delivery is virtual, one or more delivery modalities should be specified."
URL: Structures: Extension Definitions section, Delivery Method extension description

Requirement: "EndpointUseCase is an enumeration of the specific use cases (service descriptions) supported by the endpoint"
URL: Structures: Extension Definitions section, Endpoint Usecase extension description

"OrganizationAffiliation for PharmChain (MailOrder)"
"Compound Pharmacy Service provided by PharmacyOrganization A"
"Mail Order Pharmacy Service provided by PharmacyOrganization A"
"Pharmacy Service provided by PharmChain"

"Location of Pharmacy2 in PharmChain's network"
"Location of Pharmacy3 in PharmChain's network"

"The Plan-Net Server SHALL: Implement the RESTful behavior according to the FHIR specification."
"The Plan-Net Server SHALL: Return the following response classes: (Status 400): invalid parameter"
"The Plan-Net Server SHALL: Return the following response classes: (Status 401/4xx): unauthorized request"
"The Plan-Net Server SHALL: Return the following response classes: (Status 403): insufficient scope"
"The Plan-Net Server SHALL: Return the following response classes: (Status 404): unknown resource"
"The Plan-Net Server SHALL: Return the following response classes: (Status 410): deleted resource."
"The Plan-Net Server SHALL: Support json source formats for all Plan-Net interactions."
"The Plan-Net Server SHALL: Identify the Plan-Net profiles supported as part of the FHIR `meta.profile` attribute for each instance."
"Systems implementing this capability statement should meet the CMS FInal Rule requirement for provider directory access."
"A Server **SHOULD** be capable of returning a Endpoint resource using: `GET [base]/Endpoint/[id]/_history/vid`"
URL: Endpoint section, Fetch and Search Criteria

Requirement: "A Server **SHALL** be capable of supporting the following _includes: Endpoint:organization - `GET [base]/Endpoint?[parameter=value]&_include=Endpoint:organization`"
URL: Endpoint section, Fetch and Search Criteria

Requirement: "Conformance **SHALL** [organization](SearchParameter-endpoint-organization.html) reference `GET [base]/Endpoint?organization=[organization]`"
URL: Endpoint section, Search Parameter Summary table

Requirement: "Conformance **SHALL** [_id](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/search.html) token `GET [base]/Endpoint?_id=[id]`"
URL: Endpoint section, Search Parameter Summary table

Requirement: "Conformance **SHALL** [_lastUpdated](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/search.html) date `GET [base]/Endpoint?_lastUpdated=[_lastUpdated]`"
URL: Endpoint section, Search Parameter Summary table
